TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl

summary.span: 表示資料繫結控制項的 SQL 資料庫。

span.span: Represents an SQL database to data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [資料連接Data Connections](#data_connections) - [執行資料作業Performing Data Operations](#performing_data_operations) - [資料提供者Data Provider](#data_provider) - [快取Caching](#caching) - [其他功能Additional Features](#additional_features) - [資料來源檢視Data Source View](#data_source_view) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 資料來源控制項表示資料繫結控制項 SQL 關聯式資料庫中的資料。The data source control represents data in an SQL relational database to data-bound controls. 您可以使用一起與資料繫結控制項，從關聯式資料庫擷取資料，並且將顯示、 編輯和排序資料以少量或沒有程式碼在網頁上的控制項。You can use the control in conjunction with a data-bound control to retrieve data from a relational database and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page with little or no code. ## 資料連接Data Connections 若要連接到資料庫，您必須設定屬性設為有效的連接字串。To connect to a database, you must set the property to a valid connection string. 可以支援任何 SQL 關聯式資料庫可以連接到使用的 ADO.NET 提供者，例如`SqlClient`， `OleDb`， `Odbc`，或`OracleClient`提供者。The can support any SQL relational database that can be connected to using an ADO.NET provider, such as the `SqlClient`, `OleDb`, `Odbc`, or `OracleClient` provider. 如需如何保護連接字串資訊，請參閱[How To： 使用資料來源的控制項時的安全連接字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。For information about how to secure connection strings, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62). 若要從基礎資料庫中擷取資料，設定SQL 查詢的屬性。To retrieve data from an underlying database, set the property with an SQL query. 如果資料庫的相關聯的支援預存程序，您可以設定預存程序名稱的屬性。If the database that the is associated with supports stored procedures, you can set the property to the name of a stored procedure. 您指定的 SQL 查詢也可以是參數化的查詢。The SQL query that you specify can also be a parameterized query. 您可以加入參數化查詢相關聯的物件集合。You can add objects that are associated with a parameterized query to the collection. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢，其語法的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與篩選的資料來源控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and their syntax, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f). 控制項擷取資料時方法呼叫。The control retrieves data whenever the method is called. 這個方法會提供以程式設計方式存取所指定的方法屬性。This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by property. 方法會自動呼叫繫結至控制項時其方法呼叫。The method is automatically called by controls that are bound to the when their method is called. 如果您設定屬性的資料繫結控制項，控制項自動繫結至資料來自資料來源，視需要。If you set the property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as required. 設定`DataSourceID`屬性是建議的方法繫結資料繫結控制項的控制項。Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an control to a data-bound control. 或者，您可以使用`DataSource`屬性，但接著您必須明確地呼叫資料繫結控制項的方法。Alternatively, you can use the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the method of the data-bound control. 可以使用的資料繫結控制項的一些範例是， ， ，和。Some examples of data-bound controls that can use are , , , and . 您可以呼叫方法，以程式設計方式在任何時間，來擷取基礎資料庫中的資料。You can call the method programmatically at any time to retrieve data from the underlying database. 在宣告式和程式設計 ASP.NET 案例中，您可以設定資料繫結控制項的 id 屬性控制項。In declarative and programmatic ASP.NET scenarios, you can set the property of the data-bound control to the ID of the control. 您也可以指派的執行個體類別資料繫結控制項的屬性。You can also assign an instance of the class to the property of the data-bound control. 如需繫結至資料來源控制項的資料繫結控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取選項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d)。For more information about binding data-bound control to data source controls, see [ASP.NET Data Access Options](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a5ff235e-397f-4bbe-9bfe-2720b6e7ab9d). ## 執行資料作業Performing Data Operations 根據基礎資料庫產品和執行個體的組態中的功能類別，您可以執行資料作業，例如插入、 更新和刪除。Depending on the capabilities of the underlying database product and the configuration of the instance of the class, you can perform data operations, such as updates, inserts, and deletes. 若要執行這些資料作業，設定適當的命令文字和任何您想要執行的作業相關聯的參數。To perform these data operations, set the appropriate command text and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform. 比方說，更新作業中，設定SQL 字串或預存程序名稱的屬性和加入任何必要的參數，以便集合。For example, for an update operation, set the property to an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure and add any required parameters to the collection. 在執行更新時呼叫方法時，可以明確地您的程式碼也會自動由資料繫結控制項。The update is performed when the method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control. 遵循相同的一般模式和作業。The same general pattern is followed for and operations. SQL 查詢和使用中的命令， ， ，和可以參數化屬性。The SQL queries and commands that you use in the , , , and properties can be parameterized. 這表示查詢或命令可以使用預留位置，而不是常值，將預留位置繫結至應用程式或使用者定義的變數。This means that the query or command can use placeholders instead of literal values and bind the placeholders to application or user-defined variables. 您可以在 SQL 查詢中結合參數，工作階段變數時，會在 Web Form 網頁的查詢字串傳遞的值，而其他伺服器控制項，以及其他更多的屬性值。You can bind parameters in SQL queries to Session variables, values that are passed on the query string for a Web Forms page, the property values of other server controls, and more. 如需有關如何使用 SQL 查詢中使用參數，請參閱[使用參數與篩選的資料來源控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)和[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).For more information about how to use parameters in SQL queries with the , see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f) and [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，如果其中一個參數為`null`當您執行`Select`命令時，會傳回任何資料，就會擲回任何例外狀況。By default, if one of the parameters is `null` when you execute a `Select` command, no data will be returned and no exception will be thrown. 您可以變更此行為，藉由設定屬性`false`。You can change this behavior by setting the property to `false`. ## 資料提供者Data Provider 根據預設，控制項搭配.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server，但不是 Microsoft SQL Server 特有。By default, the control works with the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, but is not Microsoft SQL Server–specific. 您可以連接與受管理的 ADO.NET 提供者是任何資料庫產品的控制項。You can connect the control with any database product for which there is a managed ADO.NET provider. 當搭配提供者，可以使用任何 OLE DB 相容資料庫。When used with the provider, the can work with any OLE DB-compliant database. 當搭配提供者，可以搭配任何 ODBC 驅動程式和資料庫，包括 IBM DB2、 MySQL 和 PostgreSQL。When used with the provider, the can be used with any ODBC driver and database, including IBM DB2, MySQL, and PostgreSQL. 當搭配提供者，可與 Oracle 8.1.7 資料庫及更新版本。When used with the provider, the can work with Oracle 8.1.7 databases and later. 允許的提供者清單中註冊`DbProviderFactories`組態檔，請在 Machine.config 或 Web.config 檔案中區段。The list of allowable providers is registered in the `DbProviderFactories` section of the configuration file, either in the Machine.config or Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 SqlDataSource 控制項的選取資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb)。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb). ## 快取Caching 如果您使用頁面上顯示資料控制項，您可以使用快取資料來源控制項之能力的資料增加網頁的效能。If you display data on your page using a control, you can increase the performance of the page by using the data caching capabilities of the data source control. 快取可減少資料庫伺服器，但會犧牲 Web 伺服器上記憶體的處理負載在大部分情況下，這是理想的取捨。Caching reduces the processing load on the database servers at the expense of memory on the Web server; in most cases, this is a good trade-off. 自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`和屬性設定為快取會儲存資料快取項目會被捨棄之前的秒數。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 您也可以指定和選擇性值。You can also specify a and an optional value. ## 其他功能Additional Features 提供額外的功能，如下表所示。The provides additional capabilities, as listed in the following table. |功能Capability|需求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |快取Caching|設定屬性值屬性`true`，和和根據您想要針對您快取資料的快取行為的屬性。Set the property to the value, the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| |DeletingDeleting|設定屬性可用來刪除資料的 SQL 陳述式。Set the property to an SQL statement used to delete data. 這個陳述式通常是參數化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |篩選Filtering|設定屬性值。Set the property to the value. 設定屬性，以用來篩選資料的篩選運算式時方法呼叫。Set the property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the method is called.| |插入Inserting|設定來插入資料的 SQL 陳述式的屬性。Set the property to an SQL statement used to insert data. 這個陳述式通常是參數化。This statement is typically parameterized.| |分頁Paging|不支援目前，不過有些資料繫結控制項，例如，當您設定支援的分頁屬性值。Not currently supported by the , however some data-bound controls, such as , support paging when you set the property to the value.| |選取Selecting|設定屬性用來擷取資料的 SQL 陳述式。Set the property to an SQL statement used to retrieve data.| |排序Sorting|將 屬性設定為 。Set the property to .| |UpdatingUpdating|設定屬性用來更新資料的 SQL 陳述式。Set the property to an SQL statement used to update data. 這個陳述式通常是參數化。This statement is typically parameterized.| ## 資料來源檢視Data Source View 如同所有的資料來源控制項控制項是相關聯的資料來源檢視類別。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a data source view class. 控制項有只有一個相關聯，一律會命名為`Table`。The control has only one associated , and it is always named `Table`. 沒有任何視覺化呈現控制項等控制項，它會實作為控制項，讓您可以建立以宣告方式，並選擇性地允許它參與的狀態管理。There is no visual rendering of the control; it is implemented as a control so that you can create it declaratively and, optionally, to allow it to participate in state management. 如此一來，不支援視覺化功能，例如所提供的適用或屬性。As a result, the does not support visual features, such as the ones that are provided by the or property. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192424)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192424). 本節包含四個程式碼範例：This section contains four code examples: - 第一個程式碼範例示範如何從 SQL Server 中的資料顯示控制使用宣告式語法。The first code example demonstrates how to display data from SQL Server in a control using declarative syntax. - 第二個程式碼範例示範如何顯示來自 ODBC 相容資料庫中的資料控制使用宣告式語法。The second code example demonstrates how to display data from an ODBC-compliant database in a control using declarative syntax. - 第三個的程式碼範例示範如何顯示和更新中的資料控制項。The third code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. - 第四個的程式碼範例示範如何顯示和更新中的資料控制項。The fourth code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. > [!NOTE] > 這些範例會示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何存取資料，使用程式碼，而非標記資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以宣告方式可從 SQL Server 擷取資料，並顯示在控制項控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以宣告方式可從 ODBC 相容資料庫中擷取資料，並顯示在控制項控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. 屬性是.NET Framework 資料提供者的名稱，若是 ODBC，這是。The property is the name of the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, which is . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/CS/odbc3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/VB/odbc3vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範常見的顯示和更新的情況中使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the control. 如上述範例中，以從 Northwind 資料庫的資料會顯示在控制項。As with the previous examples, data from the Northwind database is displayed in the control. 此外，因為指定屬性和屬性設定為`true`，您可以編輯和更新的記錄沒有額外的程式碼。Additionally, because an property is specified and the property is set to `true`, you can edit and update the records with no additional code. 控制項自動處理加入參數以集合和呼叫方法時**更新**按鈕按一下控制項時。The control automatically handles adding parameters to the collection and calls the method when the **Update** button in the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/CS/sql5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/VB/sql5vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範常見的顯示和更新的情況中使用和控制項。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the and controls. 控制項不會自動將更新參數集合，也不呼叫方法，所以您必須這麼做。The control does not automatically add update parameters to the collection nor call the method, so you must do so. 更新參數會以宣告方式指定，而且您可以加入事件處理常式執行作業時引發的事件。The update parameters are specified declaratively and you can add an event handler to perform the operation when an event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅文字方塊。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL 的語法須`selectCommand`取決於目前 ADO.NET 提供者正在使用中，以識別屬性。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax for `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者是，這是預設提供者類別，參數的預留位置是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或，參數的預留位置是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or the , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 值可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序的名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The value can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control using the constructor. 此範例是不尋常的控制項當作不在 Web Form 頁面上，但在的中介層物件實作簡單的方式，為商務物件來與資料庫互動。The example is unusual in that the control is being used not on a Web Forms page, but in the implementation of a middle-tier object as a simple way for a business object to interact with a database. 範例會使用儲存在 Web.config 檔案中的連接字串。The example uses a connection string that is stored in the Web.config file. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL 的語法須`selectCommand`取決於目前 ADO.NET 提供者正在使用中，以識別`providerName`參數。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the `providerName` parameter. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者是，這是預設提供者類別，參數的預留位置是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或，參數的預留位置是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or the , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序的名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源控制項快取 方法所擷取之資料的時間長度 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time, in seconds, that the data source control caches data that is retrieved by the method.

value.span: 快取 作業結果的秒數。

span.span: The number of seconds that the caches the results of a operation.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

value.span: 值不能為負。

span.span: The value cannot be negative.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 雖然快取資料，則方法會擷取資料，從快取，而不是從基礎資料庫。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 當快取到期時，方法會從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 控制項會自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`和屬性設定為值大於 0，表示快取，儲存資料快取項目之前的秒數會被捨棄。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值為 0 指出無限長的快取。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 快取的行為取決於持續時間的組合和屬性。The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the duration and the property. 如果屬性設定為值上第一項資料擷取作業的資料會快取中，針對所指定的時間最多量保留在記憶體屬性。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by property. 需要記憶體時，可能會持續時間的時間之前釋放資料。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is required. 下次執行作業，然後會重新整理快取。The cache is then refreshed during the next operation. 如果屬性設定為資料來源控制項的值，會快取資料，在第一項資料擷取作業，但會重設它所保留的快取中的每個後續作業的時間間隔。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation. 快取過期，如果相當的時間沒有活動值自上次作業。The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the value since the last operation. 控制項可以快取資料，只有當它在時模式。The control can cache data only when it is in mode. A所擲回例外狀況方法，如果控制設為 值和快取也會啟用。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用用戶端模擬 Microsoft Windows 驗證下的時，當第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一個使用者要求相同的資料時，會從快取中擷取的資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 資料不會擷取藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上使用者存取資料，而且您希望每個擷取資料來驗證由資料庫的安全性組態，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料並顯示在控制項，以啟用快取的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 設定為 20 秒，而且因為屬性設定為值依預設，此頁面的使用者會看到新的資料每隔 20 秒。The is set to 20 seconds and, because the property is set to the value by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 雖然快取資料，則方法會擷取資料，從快取，而不是從基礎資料庫。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 當快取到期時，方法會從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 快取的行為由多種和設定。The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the and settings. 如果屬性設定為值會快取資料的第一個資料擷取作業、 保留在記憶體中所指定的時間長度屬性，然後再捨棄它之後的時間屆滿。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for the amount of time that is specified by the property, and then discards it after the time has lapsed. 下次執行作業，然後會重新整理快取。The cache is then refreshed during the next operation. 如果屬性設定為資料來源控制項的值，會快取資料，在第一項資料擷取作業，但會重設它所保留的快取中的每個後續作業的時間間隔。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation. 快取過期，如果相當的時間沒有活動值自上次作業。The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the value since the last operation. 控制項可以快取資料中的時，才模式。The control can cache data only when in the mode. A所擲回例外狀況方法，如果控制設為 值和快取也會啟用。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用用戶端模擬 Microsoft Windows 驗證下的時，當第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一個使用者要求相同的資料時，會從快取中擷取的資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 資料不會擷取藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上使用者存取資料，而且您希望每個擷取資料來驗證由資料庫的安全性組態，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料並顯示在控制項，以啟用快取的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 因為屬性設定為值，使用者不會看到資料即使值是 20 秒。Because the property is set to the value, users will not see fresh data even though the value is 20 seconds. 只有當沒有任何活動頁面上為 20 秒以上自最後一個頁面載入後，會重新整理快取的資料。The cached data is refreshed only if there is no activity on the page for more than 20 seconds since the last page load. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 雖然快取資料，則方法會擷取資料，從快取，而不是從基礎資料庫。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 當快取到期時，方法會從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 您可以設定屬性以建立所建立的所有快取項目之間的相依性控制項和索引鍵。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the control and the key. 您以程式設計的方式可以在任何時間過期所有快取項目索引鍵設定為已過期。You can programmatically expire all the cache entries at any time by expiring the key. 控制項可以快取資料中的時，才模式。The control can cache data only when in the mode. A所擲回例外狀況方法，如果控制設為 值和快取也會啟用。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. 唯一的快取項目建立的每個組合， ，和屬性。A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the , , and properties. 多個控制項可以使用相同的快取項目在案例中控制項載入相同的資料來自相同的基礎資料庫的位置。Multiple controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where the controls load the same data from the same underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用用戶端模擬 Microsoft Windows 驗證下的時，當第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一個使用者要求相同的資料時，會從快取中擷取的資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 資料不會擷取藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上使用者存取資料，而且您希望每個擷取資料來驗證由資料庫的安全性組態，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否要將舊的和新值的參數套用至`Update`方法。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 例如，如果命令是由指定屬性會傳回物件與資料行`Name`和`Number`和屬性設定為值的建立參數`Name`和`Number`如`Update`方法。For example, if the command that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number` and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果屬性設定為值的建立參數`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，和`original_Number`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. (取決於原始值參數的完整名稱屬性。)控制項，然後決定如果`Update`方法中指定屬性具有相符的參數。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the property.) The control then determines if the `Update` method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 並行存取控制是用來控制如何讀取和多個用戶端存取和管理相同的資料時，存放區中變更資料的資料存放區的技術。Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一個用戶端讀取資料並呈現給使用者，而另一個用戶端讀取相同的資料，並提供給不同的使用者。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果兩個使用者更新的資料，並送出至資料存放區，無法預料的結果可能會發生，因為兩個用戶端可能會更新為相同的資料不同的值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 這被視為衝突。This is considered a conflict. 藉由設定屬性值，您`Update`方法可以然後比較舊的和新值來偵測衝突，以及處理它們，視原始資料來源。By setting the property to the value, your `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary. 屬性委派給屬性與其相關聯物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: .NET Framework 資料提供者特定的字串， 會用來連接至其所表示的 SQL 資料庫。

span.span: A .NET Framework data provider–specific string that the uses to connect to the SQL database that it represents.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以搭配各種不同的 ADO.NET 提供者和用來連接到基礎資料來源的連接字串語法是特定提供者。The control can be used with a variety of ADO.NET providers and the syntax of the connection string that is used to connect to an underlying data source is specific to the provider. 當您設定控制項，您設定的資料庫類型的屬性 (預設值是)，而且您將包含的資訊，才能連接的連接字串屬性資料庫中。When you configure a control, you set the property to the type of database (the default is ), and you set the property to a connection string that includes information that is required in order to connect to the database. 連接字串的內容資料庫存取資料來源控制項的類型而有所不同。The contents of a connection string differ depending on what type of database the data source control is accessing. 例如，控制項需要伺服器名稱、 資料庫 （目錄） 名稱和如何連接到 SQL Server 時，驗證使用者的相關資訊。For example, the control requires a server name, database (catalog) name, and information about how to authenticate the user when connecting to a SQL Server. 連接字串的內容的相關資訊，請參閱屬性類別屬性類別屬性類別，或屬性類別。For information about the contents of connection strings, see the property for the class, property for the class, property for the class, or the property for the class. 如果您變更屬性，引發事件時，造成繫結至任何控制項重新繫結的控制項。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the control to rebind. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如需儲存連接字串的相關資訊，請參閱[How To： 使用資料來源的控制項時，保護連接字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62)。For information about storing a connection string, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/942f6dcb-d278-4bec-8403-60eede9bcd62). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性連接到 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫，並顯示結果的屬性控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. 第二個程式碼範例示範更複雜的案例，其中控制項用來顯示和更新受密碼保護的 Microsoft Access 資料庫中的資料。The second code example demonstrates a more complex scenario, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Microsoft Access database. 在每個案例中， `connectionStrings` Web.config 檔案的項目會顯示第一個，後面接著包含 ASP.NET 網頁控制項。In each case, the `connectionStrings` element of the Web.config file is shown first, followed by the ASP.NET page that contains the control. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性連接到 SQL Server 資料庫，並顯示結果的屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範更複雜的案例比先前的程式碼範例，其中控制項用來顯示和更新受密碼保護 Access 資料庫中的資料。The following code example demonstrates a more complex scenario than the preceding code example, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Access database. 因為存取，搭配使用屬性設定為提供者，而屬性設定為 UNC 共用存取資料庫的適當的連接字串。Because the is used with Access, the property is set to the provider, and the property is set to an appropriate connection string for a UNC-shared Access database. A控制項會顯示訂單的出貨日期。A control displays orders with shipment dates. 您可以透過選取適當的核取方塊，，然後按一下 [更新訂單**更新**] 按鈕。You can update an order by checking the appropriate check box, and then clicking the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含了密碼，以純文字格式只適用於示範用途。This example includes a password in plain text only for illustration purposes. 在實際執行應用程式中包含密碼的連接字串應該加密。In a production application, connection strings that include passwords should be encrypted. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護連線資訊](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md)。For more information, see [Protecting Connection Information](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料擷取模式，識別如何控制項從基礎資料庫中擷取資料。The data retrieval mode identifies how a control retrieves data from the underlying database. 當屬性設定為值，將資料載入至物件和儲存在伺服器上的記憶體。When the property is set to the value, data is loaded into a object and stored in memory on the server. 這可讓在使用者介面控制項，例如案例，提供排序、 篩選和分頁功能。This enables scenarios where user interface controls, such as , offer sorting, filtering, and paging capabilities. 當屬性設定為值，以擷取資料物件，它是一個順向唯讀資料指標。When the property is set to the value, data is retrieved by a object, which is a forward-only, read-only cursor. 特定型別的物件相依於最終資料提供者，用途，由屬性。The specific type of the object depends on the NET data provider that the uses, which is identified by the property. 根據預設，控制項所使用的提供者的 Microsoft SQL Server， ，而且資料讀取器物件。By default, the control uses the provider for Microsoft SQL Server, the , and the data reader is a object. 如果您變更屬性，引發事件時，造成繫結至任何控制項重新繫結。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性控制權傳輸至值的案例需要未排序的控制項、 分頁，或篩選。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control to the value for a scenario with a control that requires no sorting, paging, nor filtering. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用 SQL 字串和 集合中的任何參數，執行刪除作業。

returns.span: 表示從基礎資料庫刪除之資料列數的值。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行刪除作業之前，呼叫方法來引發事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行任何前置處理之前刪除作業。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a delete operation. 在作業完成之後，呼叫方法來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法會提供以程式設計方式存取`Delete`方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Delete` method. 如果控制項是與資料繫結控制項產生關聯，將資料繫結控制項自動呼叫**刪除**方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the **Delete** method. 方法會委派給方法與其相關聯物件控制項。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要執行此作業，建置物件使用文字和任何相關聯值，然後再執行對基礎資料庫。To perform the operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated values, and then executes the against the underlying database. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定文字，以從 Northwind 資料庫中刪除訂單。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 一開始，資料會從 Orders 資料表中擷取並顯示在控制項。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 您必須明確宣告屬性並呼叫方法時使用資料繫結控制項，例如(不像其他控制項，例如和，這會自動填入參數和呼叫上資料來源控制項的方法)。You must explicitly declare the property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as the (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call the method on a data source control). 在此範例中，事件委派給私用`OnDelete`事件處理常式，它會明確呼叫方法控制項。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeleteCommand { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 字串， 控制項會用來刪除基礎資料庫的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to delete data from the underlying database.

value.span: SQL 字串， 會用來刪除資料。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to delete data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 SQL 查詢或預存程序的名稱，並且由方法。The represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型的查詢或命令，參數的語法也會取決於所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者中。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the syntax of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者是，這是預設提供者類別，參數的語法是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the syntax of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或，參數的預留位置是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序的名稱，如果資料庫支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the database supports stored procedures. 屬性委派給屬性與其相關聯物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 基於安全性考量，屬性不會儲存在檢視狀態。For security purposes, the property is not stored in view state. 很可能在用戶端上檢視狀態的內容進行解碼，因為檢視中儲存機密資訊的資料庫結構狀態可能會導致資訊洩漏的弱點。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定刪除訂單 Northwind 資料庫 Orders 資料表中的文字。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database Orders table. 資料會從 Orders 資料表中擷取並顯示在控制項。Data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 呈現**刪除**自動按鈕時屬性設定為`true`。The renders a **Delete** button automatically when the property is set to `true`. 此外，當**刪除**按一下按鈕時，控制項就會自動填入集合和呼叫方法。Additionally, when the **Delete** button is clicked, the control automatically populates the collection and calls the method. 最後，因為這個程式碼範例會刪除資料，則事件處理常式嘗試將資料庫備份至磁碟之前新增執行作業。Finally, because this code example deletes data, an event handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢，集合包含任何對應於 SQL 字串中的參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. > [!NOTE] > 請確定沒有您繫結至資料繫結控制項中的控制項控制項具有符合中的任何參數名稱名稱集合。Make sure that no controls in the data-bound control that you bind to the control have names that match any parameter names in the collection. 可能會產生參數繫結的欄位會從 SQL 命令，並 「 未提供參數 」 的錯誤排除具有相同的名稱。Parameters that have the same name as bound fields are excluded from the SQL command, and a "parameter was not supplied" error might result. 如果屬性設定為值資料的舊的和新值，會建立參數。If the property is set to the value, the parameters are created for both the old and new values of the data. 舊值的參數會根據名為屬性。The parameters for the old values are named according to the property. 根據 ADO.NET 提供者中的參數順序集合可能十分重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供者建立關聯的參數在參數化 SQL 查詢中出現的順序根據集合中的參數。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，這是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，將集合中的參數使用 SQL 查詢中預留位置比對參數的名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with the placeholder in the SQL query. 如需參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性擷取屬性所包含的與其相關聯物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定文字，以從 Northwind 資料庫中刪除訂單。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 一開始，資料會從 Orders 資料表中擷取並顯示在控制項。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 您必須明確宣告屬性並呼叫方法時使用資料繫結控制項，例如(不像其他控制項，例如和，這會自動填入的參數和呼叫上資料來源控制項)。You must explicitly declare property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call on a data source control). 在此範例中，事件委派給私用`OnDelete`事件處理常式，它會明確呼叫方法控制項。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. summary.span: 在刪除作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before a delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件以執行額外的初始化作業專屬於您的應用程式，來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前控制項執行刪除作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 基礎資料來源的連接尚未開啟時，會呼叫事件處理常式委派。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您無法在作業取消直接藉由呼叫方法所公開的物件物件。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 您可以不過，將資料庫作業取消藉由設定屬性物件`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理之前引發的事件進行作業。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event that is raised before a operation occurs. 因為此範例會從 Northwind 資料庫中，刪除資料處理常式會嘗試將資料庫備份至磁碟之前加入執行作業。Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是否啟用了資料快取。

span.span: if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 雖然快取資料，則方法會擷取資料，從快取，而不是從基礎資料庫。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 當快取到期時，方法會從基礎資料庫中，擷取資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 控制項會自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`和屬性設定為值大於 0，表示快取區儲存資料，然後再擷取秒數最新的組。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before retrieving a fresh set. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用用戶端模擬 Microsoft Windows 驗證下的時，當第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一個使用者要求相同的資料時，會從快取中擷取的資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 資料不會擷取藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有一個以上使用者存取資料，而且您希望每個擷取資料來驗證由資料庫的安全性組態，請勿使用快取。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料並顯示在控制項，以啟用快取的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 屬性設定為`true`和設定為 20 秒。The property is set to `true` and the is set to 20 seconds. 因為屬性設定為欄位，根據預設，此頁面的使用者會看到新的資料每隔 20 秒。Because the property is set to the field by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FilterExpression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當呼叫 時會套用的篩選運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method is called.

value.span: 字串，代表當使用 方法抓取資料時套用的篩選運算式。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值是格式字串運算式 (字串可以處理方法)，其使用中的值字串中包含任何替代參數的集合。The property value is a format string expression (a string that is processed by the method) that uses the values in the collection for any substitution parameters included in the string. 篩選運算式語法是相同的語法可接受的屬性，因為篩選運算式會套用至屬性傳回從執行物件方法。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property, because the filter expression is applied to the property of the object that is returned from executing the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如果您加入參數，以便集合，您也可以包含格式字串預留位置 (例如，`"{0}")`中替換參數值的運算式。If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders (for example, `"{0}")` in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 根據中的參數索引來取代預留位置集合。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 如果在物件集合是`null`，物件將會取代為空字串。If an object in the collection is `null`, the object will be replaced by an empty string. 您可以包含在參數屬性。You can include parameters in the property. 如果參數是字串或字元類型，請使用單引號括住參數。If the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果參數是數值類型，就不需要引號。Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合包含的參數，會評估中找到的預留位置屬性。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 控制項支援篩選的資料中的時，才模式。The control supports filtering data only when in the mode. 屬性委派給屬性與其相關聯物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並使用字串和集合。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using a string and the collection. 屬性會套用任何時間方法會執行，以擷取資料。The property is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此範例中，包含篩選參數，而包含在預留位置集合。In this example, the contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，filter 參數是物件繫結至屬性控制項。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因為控制項有其屬性設定為`true`中的選取範圍的任何變更控制會造成頁面回傳至伺服器的資訊和控制項重新繫結至資料來源使用新的篩選器來控制。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection for the control causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件以執行驗證作業篩選參數值之前控制項執行篩選作業。Handle the event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the control performs a filter operation. 您可以取消方法藉由設定屬性物件`true`。You can cancel the method by setting the property of the object to `true`. 引發事件時，才屬性設定。The event is raised only if the property is set. 事件委派給事件與其相關聯物件控制項。The event delegates to the event of the object that is associated with the control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的參數集合與相關聯的任何參數中指定的屬性。The parameters in the collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the property. 中所指定的參數預留位置屬性中的參數物件的順序相符集合時方法呼叫。The parameter placeholders that are specified in the property are matched by order to parameter objects in the collection when the method is called. 屬性擷取屬性所包含的與其相關聯物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並使用和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 屬性控制套用 anytime方法會執行，以擷取資料。The property of the control is applied anytime the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此範例中，屬性包含篩選參數，而包含在預留位置集合。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，filter 參數是物件繫結至屬性控制項。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因為控制項有其屬性設定為`true`中的任何變更選取項目會造成頁面回傳至伺服器的資訊和重新繫結至資料來源控制項的控制項新的篩選條件。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用 SQL 字串和 集合中的任何參數，執行插入作業。

returns.span: 表示插入基礎資料庫之資料列數的值。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows inserted into the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行插入作業之前，呼叫方法來引發事件。Before the insert operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行任何前置處理之前作業。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before the operation. 若要執行插入作業，物件組建物件使用文字和任何相關聯屬性，然後執行對基礎資料庫物件。To perform an insert operation, the object builds an object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 在作業完成之後，呼叫方法來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法會提供以程式設計方式存取`Insert`方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Insert` method. 如果控制項是與資料繫結控制項產生關聯，將資料繫結控制項自動呼叫`Insert`方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the `Insert` method. 方法會委派給方法與其相關聯物件控制項。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單 Web Form 頁面。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 在資料表中目前的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 您可以輸入中的值，以新增新記錄控制項，然後按一下 [**插入**] 按鈕。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 當**插入**按一下按鈕時，指定的值插入資料庫，然後會重新整理。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and then the is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅文字方塊及值插入參數不需要驗證，也可能會造成安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). > [!NOTE] > 這個範例示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何存取資料，使用程式碼，而非標記資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ InsertCommand { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 字串， 控制項會用來將資料插入基礎資料庫。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to insert data into the underlying database.

value.span: SQL 字串， 會用來插入資料。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to insert data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表 SQL 查詢或預存程序的名稱，並且由方法。The represents either an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者是，這是預設提供者類別，參數的預留位置是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或，參數的預留位置是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 可以是 SQL 字串或名稱的預存程序中，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 這個屬性會委派至屬性相關聯控制項。This property delegates to the property of the that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 基於安全性考量，屬性不會儲存檢視狀態。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 很可能在用戶端上檢視狀態的內容進行解碼，因為檢視中儲存機密資訊的資料庫結構狀態可能會導致資訊洩漏的弱點。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單 Web Form 頁面。The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 擷取資料並顯示在控制項，以及如何使用控制項以查看詳細資料的選取資料列插入控制項和表單來插入新的記錄。The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row into the control and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 這些範例會示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何存取資料，使用程式碼，而非標記資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單 Web Form 頁面。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 在資料表中目前的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 您可以藉由輸入值來新增記錄控制項，然後按一下 [**插入**] 按鈕。You can add new records by entering values into the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 當**插入**按一下按鈕時，指定的值插入資料庫，而控制重新整理。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅，文字方塊及值插入參數不需要驗證，也可能會造成安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 SQL Server 擷取資料並顯示在控制項，以及如何使用控制項以查看選取之資料列的詳細資料控制項和表單來插入新的記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the control and as a form to insert new records. 一開始，資料會顯示在控制項，以及選取的資料列的也會顯示於控制項。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控制項使用不同的資料來源控制項; 相關聯的一個具有和屬性，可確保所選的資料列的是顯示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您按一下 自動產生**插入**按鈕控制項，顯示不同的使用者介面，用來插入新的記錄。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 此範例使用預存程序來插入記錄，並傳回插入的資料列的主索引鍵。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果您在插入記錄，會自動填入集合的值繫結資料行和呼叫方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可推斷正確的參數，從任何物件和參數物件時使用 ASP.NET 雙向資料繫結語法。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此範例中，加入額外的參數事件處理常式處理由預存程序的主索引鍵。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最後，資料會插入至資料庫之後控制項，事件處理常式會呼叫處理不會顯示事件，插入的資料列的主索引鍵的值和方法控制項稱為明確地將資料重新整理。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

相關聯的一個具有和屬性，可確保所選的資料列的是顯示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您按一下 自動產生**插入**按鈕控制項，顯示不同的使用者介面，用來插入新的記錄。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 此範例使用預存程序來插入記錄，並傳回插入的資料列的主索引鍵。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果您在插入記錄，會自動填入集合的值繫結資料行和呼叫方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可推斷正確的參數，從任何物件和參數物件時使用 ASP.NET 雙向資料繫結語法。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此範例中，加入額外的參數事件處理常式處理由預存程序的主索引鍵。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最後，資料會插入至資料庫之後控制項，事件處理常式會呼叫處理不會顯示事件，插入的資料列的主索引鍵的值，而方法控制項稱為明確地將資料重新整理。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. summary.span: 在插入作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before an insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件以執行額外的初始化作業專屬於您的應用程式，來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前控制項執行插入作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 基礎資料來源的連接尚未開啟時，會呼叫事件處理常式委派。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您無法在作業取消直接藉由呼叫方法所公開的物件屬性。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the property. 您可以不過，將資料庫作業取消藉由設定屬性物件`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 擷取資料並顯示在控制項，以及如何使用查看選取之資料列的詳細資料控制項和形式插入新記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何存取資料，使用程式碼，而非標記資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). 一開始，資料會顯示在控制項，以及選取的資料列的也會顯示於控制項。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控制項使用不同的資料來源控制項; 相關聯的一個具有和屬性，可確保所選的資料列的是顯示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您按一下 自動產生**插入**按鈕控制項，顯示不同的使用者介面，用來插入新的記錄。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 此範例使用預存程序來插入記錄，並傳回插入的資料列的主索引鍵。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果您在插入記錄，會自動填入集合的值繫結資料行和呼叫方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可推斷正確的參數，從任何物件和參數ASP.NET 雙向資料繫結語法使用時。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此範例中，加入額外的參數事件處理常式處理由預存程序的主索引鍵。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最後，資料會插入至資料庫之後控制項，事件處理常式會呼叫處理不會顯示事件，插入的資料列的主索引鍵的值，而`DataBind`方法控制項稱為明確地將資料重新整理。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the `DataBind` method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InsertParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得參數集合，包含與 控制項相關聯之 物件 屬性所使用的參數。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，包含 屬性所使用的參數。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性擷取屬性所包含的與其相關聯物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢，集合包含任何對應於 SQL 字串中的參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 根據 ADO.NET 提供者中的參數順序集合可能十分重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供者將出現在參數化 SQL 查詢中參數的順序根據集合中的參數產生關聯。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，這是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，將產生關聯，集合中的參數符合參數在 SQL 查詢中的預留位置別名的名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 如需參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單 Web Form 頁面。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 在資料表中目前的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 您可以輸入中的值，以新增新記錄控制項，然後按一下 [**插入**] 按鈕。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 當**插入**按一下按鈕時，指定的值插入資料庫，而控制重新整理。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅，文字方塊及值插入參數不需要驗證，也可能會造成安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). > [!NOTE] > 這個範例示範如何使用宣告式語法進行資料存取。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 如需如何存取資料，使用程式碼，而非標記資訊，請參閱[存取 Visual Studio 中的資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9812a6d5-23d2-4427-8b98-70a2abfec3bc). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定格式字串，套用至傳遞給 或 方法之任何參數的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of any parameters that are passed to the or method.

value.span: 字串，表示套用至傳遞給 或 方法之任何 參數名稱的格式字串。

span.span: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any parameters passed to the or methods.

value.span: 預設值為 "{0}"。

span.span: The default is "{0}".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字串只會套用到主索引鍵，例如，藉以`DataKeyNames`屬性相關聯的資料繫結控制項，或在刪除和更新案例其中屬性設定為值和一組`oldValues`會傳遞至相對應的資料方法。The format string is applied only to primary keys, such as those that are identified by the `DataKeyNames` property of the associated data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在此情況下，格式字串套用至每個參數名稱`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 兩個常見的案例，您可能會在其中變更屬性如下：Two common scenarios where you might change the property are as follows: - 若要區分在更新舊的和新值。To differentiate between old and new values in updates. 當屬性設定為值參數的原始和新的值都會加入集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 而格式化的字串，不會為每個資料欄位建立具有相同名稱的兩個參數。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 藉由變更原始值參數的名稱，您可以比較原始資料來源偵測衝突，並比較索引鍵值的資料。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 有些視覺化設計工具會實作特定的命名配置，針對原始值和索引鍵。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys.

summary.span: 取得或設定 .NET Framework 資料提供者的名稱， 控制項會用來連接至基礎資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .NET Framework data provider that the control uses to connect to an underlying data source.

value.span: 使用的資料提供者名稱，如果未設定提供者，則為 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET。

span.span: The name of the data provider that the uses; otherwise, the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server, if no provider is set.

value.span: 預設值為 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET。

span.span: The default is the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 還包括下列資料提供者：The .NET Framework includes the following data providers: - 提供者是.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的預設值。The provider is the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. - 提供者是.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB. - 提供者是.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC. - 提供者是.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle. 屬性永遠不會設定為未受管理的 ADO.NET 提供者的名稱這類`MSDAORA`。The property is never set to the name of an unmanaged ADO.NET provider, such as `MSDAORA`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 SqlDataSource 控制項的選取資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb)。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/44623286-ff5a-4148-8a3c-85c56ed545eb). 如果您變更屬性，引發事件時，造成繫結至任何控制項重新繫結。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 可用的提供者的清單中指定`DbProviderFactories`小節的`system.data`Machine.config 檔案的區段。A list of available providers is specified in the `DbProviderFactories` subsection of the `system.data` section of the Machine.config file. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼示範如何連接到 SQL Server 資料庫使用預設.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的控制項， 。The first code demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server for the control, the . 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC，ODBC 資料庫連接。The second code example demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 下列程式碼範例示範如何連接至使用預設 data provider for SQL Server 資料庫控制項， 。The following code example demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default data provider for the control, the . 每當屬性未明確設定，會使用預設提供者。Whenever the property is not explicitly set, the default provider is used. 屬性是特定提供者。The property is provider-specific. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)] 等同於在功能上先前的程式碼範例，下列程式碼範例示範如何使用.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC，ODBC 資料庫連接。The following code example, which is functionally the same as the preceding code example, demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 屬性設定為 ODBC 資料來源名稱 (DSN) 用來連接至 ODBC 資料庫的名稱。The property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN) that is used to connect to the ODBC database. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/CS/odbc1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/VB/odbc1vb.aspx#1)]
